# Dr. Dhaval Trivedi | AI Expert, Vedic Research & Multi-Domain Consultant

Summary: Official repository of knowledge and tools for Dr. Dhaval Trivedi, specializing in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Vedic Astrology, Numerology, Palmistry, Vastu Shastra, and Music.

## Core Expertises
- AI & Machine Learning: [ai-machine-learning.html](https://www.drdhaval.in/ai-machine-learning)
- Vedic Astrology: [vedic-astrology.html](https://www.drdhaval.in/vedic-astrology)
- Numerology & Calculators: [numerology.html](https://www.drdhaval.in/numerology)
- Palmistry AI Tool: [palmistry.html](https://www.drdhaval.in/palmistry)
- Vastu Shastra: [vastu-shastra.html](https://www.drdhaval.in/vastu-shastra)
- Music, Guitar & Vocals: [guitar-music-vocals.html](https://www.drdhaval.in/guitar-music-vocals)
